description: This module introduces students to the key concepts in human resource (HR) analytics and machine learning. The module also introduces R programming for data analytics in HR and performing basic machine learning analysis.
title: Using R for HR analytics and machine learning
prerequisite:
•	MNO1706 Organisational Behaviour; or
•	MNO1706X Organisational Behavior; or
•	PL3239 Industrial and Organisational Psychology; 
and
•	MNO2705 Leadership and Decision Making under Uncertainty
